title: Sweetmeat Glass, ca. 1800–20
provenance: Maureen Thompson, London; 1980 Phelps Warren, NY
description: Deep fluted-shaped bowl, short tapered stem, slightly domed 8-sided foot; lip scalloped with fan cutting, below that cut drapery swags with narrow vertical flutes above and wide flutes below, foot cut with facets at edges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sweetmeat Glass, ca. 1800–20.
ca. 1800–20. Glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-242.
